scripts.dev:frontend: npm run serve:frontend & { npm-watch dev:frontend:exe && killall -9 frontendServer; }
scripts.dev:backend:exe: cabal new-build backend --project-file=cabal.project --builddir=dist/ghc/ && { killall -9 backend || true; } && echo 'Restarting backend' && npm run serve:backend
scripts.dev:frontend:exe: cabal new-build exe:frontend --project-file=cabal-ghcjs.project --builddir=dist/ghcjs/ && { true; } && { npm run distribute || true; }
scripts.prod:frontend: cabal new-build exe:frontend --project-file=cabal-ghcjs.project --builddir=dist/ghcjs/ && cp ./dist/ghcjs/build/*/ghcjs-*/*/x/*/build/frontend/frontend.jsexe/all.js ./dist/site/main.js && closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --jscomp_off="*" --js ./dist/site/main.js --js_output_file dist/site/main.js.min && gzip < ./dist/site/main.js.min > ./dist/site/main.js.min.gz
